name: Sticky.io (itch)
description:
Sticky.io is a multiplayer game developed by kevin da silva a game development student ,sticky.io is a multiplayer game with mechanics of katamari damacy (a object grow and sticky mechanic like some hipercasual games)and agar.io(multiplayer competition  like the games of voodoo studios another refErences for this game is hole.io and crowd.io).

This game is just about GROW and GLOW get bigger and get stronger wipe out all the other players and be the BIGGEST.
